text: @DavidJUrban @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump Trump’s response to #COVID19 has put over 16 million people out of work, so you can just retreat back to your little den of ineptitude.  The United States has the highest number of deaths in the world related to the Coronavirus; that’s on the @POTUS.
